#include<stdio.h>
int abs(int a)
{
	if(a < 0)
		return -a ;
	else
		return a ;
}
int main()
{
	int l,m,t,n,prev,cur ;
	char ch ;
	m = 1000000007 ;
	scanf("%d",&prev) ;
	ch = getchar() ;
	while(ch>30)
	{
		scanf("%d",&cur) ;
		l = abs(cur-prev) ;
		if(l < m)
			m = l ;
		prev = cur ;
		ch = getchar() ;
	}
	printf("%d\n",m);
	return 0 ;
}
